crul
  • Reference
  • Articles
  • News

Base response object

Base response object

Arguments

url

(character) A url, required
opts

(list) curl options
handle

A handle
method

(character) HTTP method
status_code

(integer) status code
request_headers

(list) request headers, named list
response_headers

(list) response headers, named list
modified

(character) modified date
times

(vector) named vector
content

(raw) raw binary content response
request

request object, with all details

Details

Methods

parse()

Parse the raw response content to text

success()

Was status code less than or equal to 201. returns boolean

status_http()

Get HTTP status code, message, and explanation

raise_for_status()

Check HTTP status and stop with appropriate HTTP error code and message if >= 300. - If you have fauxpas installed we use that, otherwise use httpcode

Examples

x <- HttpResponse$new(method = "get", url = "https://httpbin.org")
x$url
#> [1] "https://httpbin.org"
x$method
#> [1] "get"

x <- HttpClient$new(url = 'https://httpbin.org')
(res <- x$get('get'))
#> <crul response> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org/get
#>   request_headers: 
#>     User-Agent: libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110
#>     Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
#>   response_headers: 
#>     status: HTTP/1.1 200 OK
#>     connection: keep-alive
#>     server: meinheld/0.6.1
#>     date: Mon, 15 May 2017 18:12:01 GMT
#>     content-type: application/json
#>     access-control-allow-origin: *
#>     access-control-allow-credentials: true
#>     x-powered-by: Flask
#>     x-processed-time: 0.00114893913269
#>     content-length: 287
#>     via: 1.1 vegur
#>   status: 200
res$request_headers
#> $`User-Agent`
#> [1] "libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110"
#> 
#> $`Accept-Encoding`
#> [1] "gzip, deflate"
#> 
res$response_headers
#> $status
#> [1] "HTTP/1.1 200 OK"
#> 
#> $connection
#> [1] "keep-alive"
#> 
#> $server
#> [1] "meinheld/0.6.1"
#> 
#> $date
#> [1] "Mon, 15 May 2017 18:12:01 GMT"
#> 
#> $`content-type`
#> [1] "application/json"
#> 
#> $`access-control-allow-origin`
#> [1] "*"
#> 
#> $`access-control-allow-credentials`
#> [1] "true"
#> 
#> $`x-powered-by`
#> [1] "Flask"
#> 
#> $`x-processed-time`
#> [1] "0.00114893913269"
#> 
#> $`content-length`
#> [1] "287"
#> 
#> $via
#> [1] "1.1 vegur"
#> 
res$parse()
#> No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8.
#> [1] "{\n  \"args\": {}, \n  \"headers\": {\n    \"Accept\": \"*/*\", \n    \"Accept-Encoding\": \"gzip, deflate\", \n    \"Connection\": \"close\", \n    \"Host\": \"httpbin.org\", \n    \"User-Agent\": \"libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110\"\n  }, \n  \"origin\": \"157.130.179.86\", \n  \"url\": \"https://httpbin.org/get\"\n}\n"
res$status_code
#> [1] 200
res$status_http()
#> <Status code: 200>
#>   Message: OK
#>   Explanation: Request fulfilled, document follows
res$status_http()$status_code
#> [1] "200"
res$status_http()$message
#> [1] "OK"
res$status_http()$explanation
#> [1] "Request fulfilled, document follows"
res$success()
#> [1] TRUE

x <- HttpClient$new(url = 'https://httpbin.org/status/404')
(res <- x$get())
#> <crul response> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org/status/404
#>   request_headers: 
#>     User-Agent: libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110
#>     Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
#>   response_headers: 
#>     status: HTTP/1.1 404 NOT FOUND
#>     connection: keep-alive
#>     server: meinheld/0.6.1
#>     date: Mon, 15 May 2017 18:12:01 GMT
#>     content-type: text/html; charset=utf-8
#>     access-control-allow-origin: *
#>     access-control-allow-credentials: true
#>     x-powered-by: Flask
#>     x-processed-time: 0.000746965408325
#>     content-length: 0
#>     via: 1.1 vegur
#>   status: 404
 ## Not run: res$raise_for_status()

x <- HttpClient$new(url = 'https://httpbin.org/status/414')
(res <- x$get())
#> <crul response> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org/status/414
#>   request_headers: 
#>     User-Agent: libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110
#>     Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
#>   response_headers: 
#>     status: HTTP/1.1 414 REQUEST URI TOO LONG
#>     connection: keep-alive
#>     server: meinheld/0.6.1
#>     date: Mon, 15 May 2017 18:12:01 GMT
#>     content-type: text/html; charset=utf-8
#>     access-control-allow-origin: *
#>     access-control-allow-credentials: true
#>     x-powered-by: Flask
#>     x-processed-time: 0.000998020172119
#>     content-length: 0
#>     via: 1.1 vegur
#>   status: 414
 ## Not run: res$raise_for_status()
